body.bibl: Yacoub, Joseph. “Christian Minorities in the Countries of the Middle-East: A Glimpse to the Present Situation and Future Perspectives.” In Syriac Churches Encountering Islam: Past Experiences and Future Perspectives, edited by Dietmar W. Winkler, 172–218. Pro Oriente Studies in the Syriac Tradition 1. Piscataway, New Jersey: Gorgias Press, 2010.
